NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

NotesPayableToBankCurrent.label: Notes Payable to Bank, Current
NotesPayableToBankCurrent.description: Current portion of the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment with long term maturities. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncomeLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income, Lease Payments
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncomeLeasePayments.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Excludes variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

OtherNotesPayableCurrent.label: Other Notes Payable, Current
OtherNotesPayableCurrent.description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

OtherPreferredStockDividendsAndAdjustmen.label: Other Preferred Stock Dividends and Adjustments
OtherPreferredStockDividendsAndAdjustmen.description: Amount of preferred stock dividends and adjustments classified as other.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsOfLoanCosts.label: Payments of Loan Costs
PaymentsOfLoanCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.label: Payments to Acquire Assets, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow to acquire an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the entity (holder) a definite sum of money at a future date. Such amount may include accrued interest receivable in accordance with the terms of the note. The note also may contain provisions including a discount or premium, payable on demand, secured, or unsecured, interest bearing or noninterest bearing, among myriad other features and characteristics.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

PreferredStockDividends.label: Preferred Stock Dividends (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
PreferredStockDividends.description: The amount of dividends declared or paid in the period to preferred shareholders, or the amount for which the obligation to pay them dividends arose in the period.

PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.label: Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustmen.description: The aggregate value of preferred stock dividends and other adjustments necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PreferredStockValueOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Outstanding
PreferredStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

PrepaidExpense.label: Prepaid Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
PrepaidExpense.description: Carrying amount for a unclassified balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs. For a classified balance sheet, represents the noncurrent portion of prepaid expenses (the current portion has a separate concept).

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance for expenses which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

PresentValueOfFutureMinimumLeasePayments.label: Present Value of Future Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions
PresentValueOfFutureMinimumLeasePayments.description: Present value of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Excluding Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes option exercised.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfInvestmentProjects.label: Proceeds from Sale of Investment Projects
ProceedsFromSaleOfInvestmentProjects.description: The cash inflow from the sale of investment projects held by an entity in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RelatedPartyTransactionRate.label: Related Party Transaction, Rate
RelatedPartyTransactionRate.description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

RentalIncomeNonoperating.label: Rental Income, Nonoperating
RentalIncomeNonoperating.description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfSubordinatedShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Subordinated Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfSubordinatedShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.label: Research and Development Expense
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalariesAndWages.label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesAndWages.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.label: Salary and Wage, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer and officer employees. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ServicingFees.label: Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ServicingFees.description: Amount of fees from providing shareholder services, including, but not limited to, answering shareholder inquiries and providing shareholders with information about their investments.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated during the reporting period due to noncompliance with plan terms during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Period Increase (Decrease), Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Change in the weighted average exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all awards outstanding under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

SharebasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Compensation, Shares Authorized under Stock Option Plans, Exercise Price Range, Exercisable Options, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
SharebasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The weighted average remaining life of the exercisable stock options as of the balance sheet date for all option plans in the customized range of exercise prices.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.label: Short-term Debt, Interest Rate Increase
ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.description: Percentage increase in the stated interest rate on a short-term debt instrument.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.label: Short-term Debt, Average Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, average borrowings during the period.

StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.label: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Subscriptions Receivable
StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, after forfeiture, of shares or units issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes shares or units issued under employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockOptionPlanExpense.label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
StockOptionPlanExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

TemporaryEquityValueExcludingAdditionalP.label: Temporary Equity, Par Value
TemporaryEquityValueExcludingAdditionalP.description: Carrying amount of the par value of temporary equity outstanding. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Converted
ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.description: "The number of shares converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Long-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of options vested.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

ConvertibleNotesPayable.label: Convertible Notes Payable
ConvertibleNotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a written promise to pay a note, initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, which can be exchanged for a specified amount of one or more securities (typically common stock), at the option of the issuer or the holder.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdPercen.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Percentage of Stock Price Trigger
DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdPercen.description: Minimum percentage of common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments to determine eligibility of conversion.

DefinedBenefitPlanFundedPercentage.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded Percentage
DefinedBenefitPlanFundedPercentage.description: Percentage of plan assets to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Noncurrent
DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromEmployeesNoncurrent.label: Due from Employees, Noncurrent
DueFromEmployeesNoncurrent.description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.label: Excess Stock, Shares Authorized
ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.description: Maximum number of excess stock shares permitted to be issued.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

InventoryGross.label: Inventory, Gross
InventoryGross.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.label: Principal Amount Outstanding of Loans Held-in-portfolio
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.label: Professional and Contract Services Expense
ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.description: Professional and contract service expense includes cost reimbursements for support services related to contracted projects, outsourced management, technical and staff support.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Temporary Equity, Par or Stated Value Per Share
TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Per share amount of par value or stated value of stock classified as temporary equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable.

ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Issued
ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.description: "The number of new shares issued in the conversion of stock in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOth.label: Interest Income, Securities, US Treasury and Other US Government
InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOth.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on U.S. Treasury securities and other U.S. government securities.

LongtermConstructionLoanCurrentAndNoncur.label: Long-term Construction Loan
LongtermConstructionLoanCurrentAndNoncur.description: This element represents the current and noncurrent portions of a long-term real estate loan with an initial maturity beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.label: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Increase
StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

TemporaryEquityAggregateAmountOfRedempti.label: Temporary Equity, Aggregate Amount of Redemption Requirement
TemporaryEquityAggregateAmountOfRedempti.description: Aggregate amount of redemption requirements for each class or type of redeemable stock classified as temporary equity for each of the five years following the latest balance sheet date. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossD.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossD.description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Foreign
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign operating loss carryforwards.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Due from Other Related Parties, Noncurrent
DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Balance of Agreements Outstanding
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.description: The calculated average balance outstanding for the year for all Federal Home Loan Bank advances as of the Balance Sheet date.

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestAfterA.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestAfterA.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

InvestmentTaxCredit.label: Investment Tax Credit
InvestmentTaxCredit.description: The amount deducted from an entities' taxes, reflecting a percentage of an amount invested in certain assets spread over the useful life of those assets; includes deferred investment tax credits.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

OtherDeferredCostsGross.label: Other Deferred Costs, Gross
OtherDeferredCostsGross.description: Gross amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.label: Payments to Acquire Equipment on Lease
PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.description: The cash outflow for payments to acquire rented equipment which is recorded as an asset.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

AccountsReceivableNoncurrentAccruedInter.label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
AccountsReceivableNoncurrentAccruedInter.description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent recognized by reversing interest income.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Exercise of Option, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

HealthCareOrganizationAllowanceForDoubtf.label: Health Care Organization, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Percentage of Accounts Receivable
HealthCareOrganizationAllowanceForDoubtf.description: Ratio of the allowance for doubtful accounts to accounts receivable, expressed as a percentage, for health care organizations.

InterestAndFeeIncomeOtherLoans.label: Interest and Fee Income, Other Loans
InterestAndFeeIncomeOtherLoans.description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans classified as other.

LandAndLandImprovements.label: Land and Land Improvements
LandAndLandImprovements.description: Amount before accumulated deprecation and depletion of real estate held for productive use and additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use, examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots. Excludes land held for sale.

OtherAssetsMiscellaneousNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsMiscellaneousNoncurrent.description: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

PercentageOfDebtHedgedByInterestRateDeri.label: Percentage of Debt Hedged by Interest Rate Derivatives
PercentageOfDebtHedgedByInterestRateDeri.description: Percentage of an entity's outstanding debt that is designated as a hedged item in cash flow, fair value, or net investment hedge.

PrepaidInterest.label: Prepaid Interest
PrepaidInterest.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Aggregate value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period.
